website_summaries.verdict: A nearly unbreakable dispenser bottle that looks great, although you may have to contend with some minor leaking issues.
pros: Available in a variety of sizes, from 500 to 1,000 ml
easy to refill without a funnel
cons: Some buyers report that it leaks a little due to its design

customer_reviews.title: Bottle rusted trough
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this oil/vinegar dispenser last July. It did it’s job until the bottle rusted through on the bottom of the bottle. That makes me question if the bottle is actually Stainless Steel..? Would not recommend this product. I expected it to last longer than a little bit over a year.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Flynn

customer_reviews.title: I love this oil dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil dispenser. I got this dispense and immediately filled it up with olive oil. The opening is big, so I don't need to use a funnel. I've used the dispenser for about a week now. The stream of liquid is nice and steady, with no drips. The stainless steel is sturdy enough so I don't have to worry about breaking it. It also protects my olive oil from direct light.
customer_reviews.author: Jiarui Li

customer_reviews.title: No drips, easy pour
customer_reviews.text: I've never used an oil pourer before, but it's really handy! I had bought a big canister of olive oil, but it was unwieldy to pour and always dripped down the side. I was able to empty the whole container in this pourer and the dripping has stopped. I really like this device, plus it looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: A. Branson

customer_reviews.title: NO LEAKS!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. Bought it because I was tired of oil leaking around the cork of my glass bottle. Yes, you will have one drop of oil hang on the lip of the spout, but it is easily wiped off with a paper towel (or your finger). Looks nice on my counter and although it does tend to collect fingerprints, those are easily cleaned off. I have the 750ml style which is a good size for me. The smaller one might be better for use on the table. I think I would have trouble holding the liter size with my arthritic hands.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Harris

customer_reviews.title: Good oil dispenser for short shelves
customer_reviews.text: My kitchen cabinets don't have very tall shelves, so in order to keep olive oil on hand I bought this dispenser. It's short but wide and holds plenty of oil. The lid is easy to take on/off and the design looks sleek. My only complaint is that after pouring out oil there's a little drip down onto the top of the bottle. Because the top is flat, it doesn't drip to the outside of the bottle and the lid covers any drips. However, it does need to be wiped off occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Please take the bad reviews seriously - leaks like crazy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on good reviews but it's infuriating - leaks everywhere. Seems to leak from the seal and then gets in the lid and down to the counter. Cleaning the inside of the very thin metal lid is also a food way to get a nice cut. I wish I would have paid more attention and picked something else!
customer_reviews.author: LesWil

customer_reviews.title: It leaks.
customer_reviews.text: This oil dispenser leaks in multiple places. Oil seeps out in the screw top when you pour from the spout. And then, when you close the stainless steel top, more oil gets pushed out from the top region. It’s a mess and I’m returning it as soon as I figure out where to put the oil that I poured into it.
customer_reviews.author: BostonReader

customer_reviews.title: Good way to get rid of plastic oil bottles in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little oil dispenser, is well constructed, the lid is a little loose so don't try to pick up the bottle that way.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Drip... Drip.... Drip
customer_reviews.text: This thing does dispense olive oil. However it is made out of extremely thin material. It also will leave one drop that will run down the outside of the spout every single time you tip it up to use it. I’m not sure why there seem to be so many others that claim that it doesn’t. Maybe some free samples? 8/24/2018 UPDATE: The seller has refunded me for the purchase of the item. This does not change my review of the quality of the product in any way. I do thank them for providing the customer service / satisfaction by offering the refund. That’s said, remains an inferior product that does not perform as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: J. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Used it for olive oil. Leaked where the top screws on to the base after just a few refills. Followed the washing directions but it still seemed to be an issue. Plus, after cleaning it took a very long time to dry. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Arielle

customer_reviews.title: Leaks at base of spout.
customer_reviews.text: Update: Upon seeing my review, the seller immediately emailed offering to replace or refund the item. I changed my rating to 3 stars because the customer service is good, but I still don’t see how this product could work well without a seal on the spout. This leaks at the base of the spout, where it connects into the cap. It has the silicone seal mentioned in some other reviews, but no seal where the spout clicks into the cap.
customer_reviews.author: shelli

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, functional and unbreakable
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Attractive and stylish on my cooktop, holds plenty of oil for my needs, and is unbreakable (replacing a tall glass cruet I knocked off counter and onto the floor) First one received leaked at the base of the spout, creating a mess every time I poured. The seller immediately (it arrived in two days) replaced it with one that works fine. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong chemical smell, production materials left behind.
customer_reviews.text: It had an overwhelming chemical odor to it. I attempted cleaning it and soaking it, however, the odor still lingers. There were metal shavings in the bottom when it arrived, and I could see adhesive inside along the bottom portion. Poorly designed. I would not recommend purchasing, as there are quite a few better oil containers I have found since buying this one. They all have worked better.
customer_reviews.author: HambyJay

customer_reviews.title: Leak! Leak! Leak!
customer_reviews.text: Oil leaks every time I use. I tried blowing air through the hole thinking the air hole was blocked. I tried putting a needle in the air hole. I tried closing the gasket so tight to prevent the leak. None of that works. I have been wrapping a paper towel around the gasket to catch the leak and change it when soaked with oil. Too bad it has the issue. I bought it to prevent air and light for my expensive olive oil but if half of my oil is going waste anyway, what’s the point.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent oil dispenser
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for a person who uses olive oil regularly. The gift has been highly praised by the recipient who said it is “elegant” as well as it helps pour the correct amount of oil as opposed to pouring directly from the olive oil bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: This product is a leaker
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews on similar products I choose this one, Big mistake. The bottom of the dispenser was sharp and ragged and would scratch the counter tops, I bought some felt and glued it to the bottom which solved that problem, however, the major problem is that this product leaked oil no matter what I did, I can't return it because of time passed. I will not buy anything this company produces in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew H.

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy, and buying a 2nd!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this oil dispenser, I am buying a 2nd, but smaller size, for my other oil type. It does not leak or drip. If you do get fingerprints or smudges on the outside (come on - sometimes cooking splashes), it wipes clean! I have been hiding my oils in a nearby cabinet. Not anymore! I am happy to find a container that looks great next to my black/stainless stove top. These dispensers would make a great gift also.
customer_reviews.author: KAREN K.

customer_reviews.title: Best I have found
customer_reviews.text: I use a lot of olive oil, so a good decanter is very ehlpful. This one is unbreakable of course, and liquid tight. There is one drawback- when pouring oil, there may be a drip down the plastic spout. That, over time, will cause oil to accumulate, and be messy. I try to just wipe it off occasionally, as soon as I pour. Other than that, this holds a great quantity, is easy to pour, and the cap seals it up tight.
customer_reviews.author: Dalesky

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought these bottles over all others.
customer_reviews.text: First off, I had a question and received immediate response. The Bottles are great. No leaks, and the parts fit perfectly. The cap is a perfect smooth fit, which had to be a very difficult task dealing with stainless steel. The finish is also very good. I’m glad I chose this company. It’s also nice having choice of sizes. 9/1/19 - This company is Really excellent. They take customer service to a whole new level. They not only address all questions but do so quickly. I wish they sold many other products because they would be my “go to” source.
customer_reviews.author: ski

customer_reviews.title: no more mess
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of leaky, slippery bottles of oil in the kitchen. I got the big dispenser for frying oil at the stove and a small one for olive oil for salads and such. Easy pour and mess free and they look great on the counter. You can't go wrong!!!
customer_reviews.author: nitnop

customer_reviews.title: Olive Oil
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for keeping my olive oil next to the stove. I like the spout doesn't drip and leave oil running down the container.
customer_reviews.author: MLH

customer_reviews.title: Like the convience
customer_reviews.text: Received this very quickly, using Prime. I like the convenience of using this vs the whole bottle of olive oil. I purchased this because of the cap. To many have an open top with no way to seal. The cap seals this perfectly. Easy to clean using a bottle brush. If I had to purchase this again, I would have purchased the smaller bottle only because it would fit in the cabinet better. Other than that, I have no negative comments about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: good quality & great design
customer_reviews.text: Second one that I purchase. One for the Avocado oil & the other for Olive oil. So far so good, the design is great, opening big enought to refill directly without the need of a funnel; no leak. Not messy, if there is a tiny residual after pouring the oil, it will go back to the bottle thru a small opening. Is good that the bottle has a cover, not like some others which are left open.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Leak proof! Finally.
customer_reviews.text: This is infinitely better than the traditional glass bottle olive oil dispensers you see everywhere. Those tips was never secure and would leak profusely and always left a greasy mess afterward. I was looking for a leak-proof solution and after trying this bottle for a few days, I'm happy to report that it's been 100% leak free. Any oil that drips out from the tip will just slowly roll down back into the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Seven

customer_reviews.title: It is NOT leak proof!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this oil dispenser about 9 months ago. At first I thought it was great. But it claims to be leak proof, and that turns out NOT to be true. For some reason over time, it leaks more and more. After every use I wipe it off and make sure that the exterior is clean. Yet when I go to get it the next time, there is a ring of oil on the bottom of the container. If I could I would return the item, but my return window is closed. I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS ITEM!!
customer_reviews.author: David Newburger

customer_reviews.title: attractive container
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Sits on my counter next to my other kitchen tools. It fits in with my decor. I ordered it because I buy my oil by the gallon and this makes it so handy to use. I'm glad it has a lid to protect the oil.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: Complete wast of time and money. The lid just sort of sits there without any attachment or tight fit. If it tips over it’s a disaster. Just leave your oil in the bottle it came in. Less frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: KIM A.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great oil dispenser! Love that it has a cap. I dont have any issues with leaking and the wide opening makes it easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: S.Ambrosio

customer_reviews.title: do not buy this item
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS NOT A LEAK-PROOF PRODUCT. there's a consistent issue w/leakage as indicated via other reviews & clearly the vendor is aware & does nothing to improve this product. from the start of usage, oil has leaked from its seal. it required constant cleaning of the container & its cap. it's an inefficient design. when submitting a complaint to the vendor it took them almost a week to reply. this is one of the most disappointing purchases i've ever made via amazon.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Awesome overall
customer_reviews.text: Light, stainless steel, and WASHABLE! I love that it has a spout that works well and a complete cover. Perfect for my oils and soy sauce. Cannot think of anything else to ask for. Oh, yes, maybe different colors so I can buy more and be able to tell what's in each bottle without labeling.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Very fast service and great product
customer_reviews.text: I was not very happy when I first received this but you corrected the very fast and the new one is very nice thank you very much
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First one was defective, but they made it right.
customer_reviews.text: Leakproof? Who? Where? This thing is absolutely awful. I put expensive Brain Octane oil from Bulletproof in this thing and I've lost at least a fourth of it. I don't know HOW this has so many positive reviews. It has leaked down the side every time I've used it. Do not waste your money on this like I did. UPDATE: After contacting the manufacturer, they sent me not one, but TWO replacement bottles. The first one seems to be working just fine, and now I also have a back up.
customer_reviews.author: JMill

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had found this long ago! Easy to use, easy to fill, easy to clean, easy to pour. The pour opening is a little bigger than I was used to, but I've adjusted to it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet S.

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful dispenser. Very easy to use and looks great in my kitchen with stainless steel appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it has a screw on cap which is exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: love everything about it. I have not used it that much yet, but how can it not be durable ?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks and functions great
customer_reviews.text: My huge plastic bottle of olive oil cluttered up my countertop. I now own a stainless utensil holder, stainless salt and pepper shakers and stainless olive oil containers. They are grouped together next to the oven and look just great, very upscale.
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: Great product !!
customer_reviews.text: The oil dispense is a great product for daily use. Oil does not spill or leak from the dispenser. It can be easily cleaned.. worth the price
customer_reviews.author: abby06

customer_reviews.title: Take your favorite oil to work
customer_reviews.text: Excellent storage container for oils. The spout is drip proof and drops slide down the spout to a return drain. I wouldn't trust it to be spill proof in a bag as the cover slides on. I would prefer screw on cover with seal but this is an excellent value at this price point
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes life easier
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It holds a decent amount of oil and makes it easier to measure out and pour
customer_reviews.author: Phenom

customer_reviews.title: Works great without dripping all over!
customer_reviews.text: I like to use MTC oil in my coffee, but the container it comes in drips all over anytime you use it. This bottle doesn't drip or make a mess. Works great and looks nicer than a jar with a label on it.
customer_reviews.author: NashGatorGirl

customer_reviews.title: Messy
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my olive oil. They are very attractive, opaque, which is good for olive oil. The reason why I'm writing is because the spout is terrible. It leaks all over the top and runs down the bottle. I had glass bottles but they broke. They had very thin and narrow spouts that never dripped. This design is not practical. I have to constantly clean the outside of the bottle. It can be tricky especially since there is oil in it. The manufacturer needs to change the spout.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela E.

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Fits a large bottle of olive oil. Easy to pour! Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Matthews

customer_reviews.title: No regret oil container for kitchen.....
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, not easily broken like glass. Easy clean, easy fill.
customer_reviews.author: Lunavation

customer_reviews.title: Feel like i could have purchased this at the Dollar store.
customer_reviews.text: No offense to the dollar store because it think they have great items. I was excited to get this item but when I opened it, it immediately felt cheap. I did use it because I needed something to put my olive oil in because the can it came in is too big. I like the design it just seems that it could have been a little heavier. I like the plastic pour but it seems to waste quite a bit of oil when stopping the pour.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: my son liked the clear bottle
customer_reviews.text: No leaks so far....my son liked the clear bottle, but this one is clearly better than the stopper version we replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Susan R

customer_reviews.title: No more oily mess
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried 4 or 5 different oil dispensers/spouts over the last couple of years to try to rid my countertop of the oil that always dribbles down the side of the bottle. This one has finally solved the problem. I do wipe it with a paper towel around the spout/cover once every few weeks, but it is waay better than anything else I’ve had.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: as advertised
customer_reviews.text: bought to keep the oils we had from going bad before we could use them. didn't want to keep in a cabinet because then we forget to use them. Works as expected
customer_reviews.author: M. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Compact Shape is a Winner
customer_reviews.text: A great size that fits inside my old-fashioned 1985 condo cupboards. Easy to clean. I love the cap that keeps the inside contents clean & fresh. Most olive oil containers have an open spout.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Happy I got it.
customer_reviews.text: Makes pouring my oil much easier and it looks nice enough to leave out next to my stove.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: After buying multiple Oil Dispensers, I have found the right one
customer_reviews.text: Nice sized pour spout and the capacity of the bottle is just right. Very little if any dripping when pouring.
customer_reviews.author: Snoopy1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it is meant for and looks great on the stove top.
customer_reviews.author: adbestler

customer_reviews.title: unbreakable and does not drip
customer_reviews.text: Looks excellent beside my range and I love it. I have broken 3 glass decanters on my granite counter so I figured it was time to look for an unbreakable one. This one is perfect. Use it everyday and so far not a single drip or leak.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Well, one drip, but good quality
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and ease of use. There is still one drop of oil after each use. I have never found a drip-free dispenser, but this one is pretty good. I remove the one drip with a finger of a towel.
customer_reviews.author: geek extraordinaire

customer_reviews.title: Item defective
customer_reviews.text: It leaks, l have to return it, doesn’t worth the $16 dollars 💵
customer_reviews.author: esmeralda ramos

customer_reviews.title: no spill
customer_reviews.text: works great! there's a little black plastic border around the pouring spout to catch the excess oil that always drips down (no messy hands!) the top of the lid is angled downward towards the center so the oil runoff goes towards a small hole near the pouring spout.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for olive oil
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and keeps my olive oil fresh, handy, and easy to pour. I bought the large one. Easy to fill also.
customer_reviews.author: JAG51

customer_reviews.title: Good Oil Dispenser!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I was tied of using a jar which allowed oil to spill down sides making a constant mess. So far they dispenser is very clean and tidy. Looks very classy on the kitchen counter. Holds enough for quite a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Mochamom

customer_reviews.title: Great product !
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! If you use olive oil , you definitely want this!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product that DOES NOT LEAK!
customer_reviews.text: The best olive oil dispenser I've ever owned! Great quality and does what they advertise it - no leaking!
customer_reviews.author: Debe Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: I love this "soap dispenser" for my kitchen sink
customer_reviews.text: I use this for liquid soap dispenser on my kitchen sink. The last one was glass which I really liked until it broke. This is very attractive, will not break and I can keep it clean. I wish I had this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly S

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: So cheap, even the packaging had grammatical errors and bottle was photoshopped onto Lifestyle photos lol! It was made in China but like fresh from the factory smell and again Chinese language on the packaging. Overall very poor product. I’m starting to not trust the reviews on this site, how it got as many stars I have no idea, makes no sense.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Aroniadis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fill
customer_reviews.text: Used it for olive oil for all types of cooking and salads. Could use a second one for canola oil.
customer_reviews.author: L. Carnuccio

customer_reviews.title: a thin oil leaks from pour spout, olive oil runs down the outside of the spout when finished pouring
customer_reviews.text: Liked the look, liked the lid over the open spout. However, the lid over the open spout is not tight. You cannot pick up the bottle by the lid. It just rests on top of the bottle. I intended to use it for olive oil and MCT oil. But the MCT oil ran out between the spout and the black seal, it was a mess and I no longer use it for the MCT oil. I use a tissue or paper towel each time I use the olive oil to wipe the spout otherwise there would be olive oil on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: T Ontko

customer_reviews.title: Complete GARBAGE.
customer_reviews.text: Leaked all over the place even when it was just hanging out in the pantry not being poured. I kept it for as long as I could with a plate and paper towels underneath it because I had been too lazy to replace it, but finally got fed up and tossed it. Save your money!
customer_reviews.author: FLmama

customer_reviews.title: Rancid oil
customer_reviews.text: Everything I've put in this bottle goes rancid. I had plain oil in it at first, and after it went bad twice I tried using it for syrup. This also developed a rancid taste and smell.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Fills and pours easily
customer_reviews.text: Allows me to buy oils (olive and grapeseed) in larger containers. Durability I can't attest to. Maybe in 4 or 5 years...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Worst!
customer_reviews.text: Leaks terrible. No idea why there are so many good reviews. Tiny rubber gasket does nothing to keep oil from leaking out everywhere. The worst!
customer_reviews.author: MichaelA

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product. Well made and love the dust cap
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Well made and love the dust cap.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Nicely sealed so just minimal run from the spout after ...
customer_reviews.text: Nicely sealed so just minimal run from the spout after pouring. Wish it was a clear container so you could see oil level but you feel it by weight. Quality piece.
customer_reviews.author: Quantimus

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and functional
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my big oil containers away from the counters and easy enough for anyone to pour and fill. Nice stainless construction and minimal.
customer_reviews.author: Etienne

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful AND it leaks all over the place. I cannot believe this is being sold! So VERY disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: I like this product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. I pour my olive oil in it and can leave the canister on the corner because it's nice and decorative.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Holds a huge quantity, easy to clean, minor seepage around the seal
customer_reviews.text: Holds a tremendous amount of oil, leaks a very tiny bit around the seal, but it’s great otherwise so we continue to use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Penny1cent

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: I really like this oil dispenser. I got the 25oz and its the perfect size for me. The one fault I find with it is the stainless steel leaves fingerprints.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does the job! would buy/recommend. Keeps my olive oil fresh and saves from drips.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Woo

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Looks stylish, easy to clean, and top keeps nozzle free from dust, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Savy in Savannah

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE quality.
customer_reviews.text: After a few uses it started leaking. Tried to correct it to no avail. Not sure if the product is always terrible, or if I received a defective one.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Guz

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. It pours beautifully, without drips or leaks, protects the oil from light, holds just the right amount, weighs very little, looks great on the countertop.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. We use it for olive oil and keep it on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: MS2432

customer_reviews.title: NOT Leak Proof
customer_reviews.text: This is a drip proof dispenser...it is not leak proof as the description would lead you to believe.
customer_reviews.author: PhotoBuff

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice addition to stove side
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think this would be much to write about. It's surprisingly attractive next to the stove. It's also practical in use and very easy to refill.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony N Earl

customer_reviews.title: I like this...but
customer_reviews.text: I like the stainless steel oil container, but the spout does drip when you pour from it. It blocks the light so the oil lasts longer, but I think that they need to work on the design. It's nice to have a cap on iy.
customer_reviews.author: M. Merenda

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for to use at the kitchen sink for soap dispenser. It matches my faucet too. Love it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: papa

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love the chic look of this oil dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the chic look of this oil dispenser!! I like that the oil never is exposed to light and the oil pours out nicely from the dispenser. This product is as good as it looks!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Padin

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my cooking oil. Looks great on my counter. Pours easily and doesn’t leak. Love it for our RV!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy H Pooley

customer_reviews.title: The best oil dispenser
customer_reviews.text: The best oil dispenser. I bought several kind of dispensers for my mom. She still complaints. But this one. She actually like it. work well. It protects my olive oil from direct light. Easy to clean outside.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: The pourrer is to big and spill
customer_reviews.text: The materials and overall design of the bottle are good. The cap keeps dust out and prevents too much air oxidation. It's fully opaque so prevent light oxidation too. But the pourer is not much better than most default oil bottle cap and spill a lot. The diameter of the pourer is slightly too large to control the flow or to drizzle. The pourer can be removed too easily.
customer_reviews.author: Corendiel

customer_reviews.title: Great oil bottle, better than glass!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a glass oil bottle before this steel one, my wife accidently dropped and broke the glass one in a week. Now she can drop this steel one no matter how many times she likes.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Wang

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service support
customer_reviews.text: Like others have mentioned, leaking problem. Small plastic seal and gasket failed after three months of use. Until that point the dispenser worked beautifully. However the company stood behind the product and offered to replace it even though it was past the 30 day return date. Hopefully the replacement last longer. Thank you customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: George Caracostas

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean too
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I needed. Easy to clean too! Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Alia

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, poor execution.
customer_reviews.text: Quality is low. Very thin material. There is a seam you can see on the inside where it was joined at the bottom but not a very clean job. Already had signs of corrosion. Never used and returned the same day I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Ipkiss

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Its a nice container but there is 1 drop after each pour. Luckily there is an air hold to prevent a vacuum when pouring that doubles up as a oil sink to have the drop make its was back into container.
customer_reviews.author: The_Chinaman

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: It leaks on the side top. It’s functionalble but hate the leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Baesu

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it because of good reviews. Leaks like crazy. Awful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift and LOVE it. You can actually clean this one.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Great Olive Oil Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Product works as described. Do NOT overfill, or it will leak around the spout leading to an oily mess on the outside of the dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: JWilli

customer_reviews.title: Great oil dispenser!
customer_reviews.text: This oil bottle works great and the oil goes back into the bottle after you pour some in the pan. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Beth GG

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this oil dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this oil dispenser. This was the perfect size for my cupboard. I read the other reviews and do not have any trouble with dripping.
customer_reviews.author: AMD

customer_reviews.title: Very nice concept
customer_reviews.text: It seemed great at first but i have had an issue of it leaking around the edge part of the time. Not sure what I'm doing for it to only leak sometimes. Around the spout, not the screws on top.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: I hate this thing. It’s a disgusting, drippy mess. It leaves oil ALL over the place!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

product_meta.title: Flyboo Olive Oil Dispenser 17oz Oil Bottle Stainless Steel Leak Proof Olive Oil Decanter for Kitchen (500ML)
feature_bullets: SAFE& DECLARE-- The oil dispenser made of food grade thicken 304 Stainless steel provide a durable and unbreakable usage test. Oil dispenser is BPA free, with dustproof cover.

CLEAN -- Anti-drip design to prevent oil leaks and control the usage of oil precise avoiding waste and good for health, keeping the pot clean and dry. Big mouth convenience for refill oil.The lid protect the oil from dust.
DETAILED DESIGN --The top hole design, the formation of air convection, control the oil speed and smoothly. No screwed lid for easy one-handed cooking.The stainless steel bottle heat-resisting.
EASY TO CLEAN -- Easy clean by hand or in the dishwasher.with a cover that can keep the bottle mouth tube away from the bacteria/dust in the air.
PRACTICAL -- Provide three usage capacity 500ml, 750ml,1000ml. Bottle perfect for oil, olive &canola oil etc. Can use at home,restaurant,hotel, party,buffet etc.
